Reasoning: **Strategic Poker Thoughts - Round 4**

Alright, let's take stock. Ante is 3/8, small blind. Goal is 2000 chips. I'm currently at 0, with $35 in the bank. I have 4 hands, 3 discards. Got a few Jokers to play with: Gift Card (Holo, +10 mult, +$1 sell), Mail-In Rebate (Foil, +50 chips, +$5 for Queens), Trading Card (used already this round), Photograph (x2 mult on face card), and an Egg (+3 sell). Consumable: Justice (enhances to Glass). My current hand is: 7H, 6H, JC, 4C, 3C, AD, 8D, 3D.

Okay, I used the Trading Card already this round. With the initial discard, I’m left with $35. Now, the goal is 2000 chips. Let's see... my current hand options are limited. No immediate Flushes or Full Houses. 

I’ve got 2 Hearts (7H, 6H), 3 Clubs (JC, 4C, 3C), and 3 Diamonds (AD, 8D, 3D). I see I'm holding 10 of Spades, 9 of Diamonds, 16 of Hearts, and 7 of Clubs. Hearts are the most prevalent in the deck - interesting.

I need to decide what to discard. Given the discards, I really should go for the Hearts, since that's what's most common in the deck, but I'm looking at how to make my hand higher scoring. I want to build a flush. The Mail-In Rebate is enticing for Queens, but I don't have any. The Photograph, for a Face card, is good, but I can improve that card. The Justice card could make an Ace or Face card Glass. Since my hand has an Ace of Diamonds and a Jack of Clubs.

Since the goal is 2000 chips, and I have 4 hands with 3 discards... if I discard the Diamonds and Clubs, I'll have a chance to look for Hearts. I need a plan here!

Right, I can only discard 5 cards at a time. The current suits are Hearts (2), Clubs (3), Diamonds (3). The strategy, go for a Heart Flush. I am keeping the 2 Hearts.

So, discarding 3, 4, 5 Clubs and 7, 8 Diamonds. Wait, the actual hand given is: 7H, 6H, JC, 4C, 3C, AD, 8D, 3D. I should discard the 3 Diamonds (AD, 8D, 3D) and 2 Clubs (4C, 3C). 

Okay, I'm going to discard 4C, 3C, AD, 8D, 3D. That's 5 cards. Keep 7H, 6H, JC. The Mail-In Rebate could get me $5 for each discarded Queen, and I don't have any, which is okay.

The plan: A Lvl 4 Flush (80 chips, 10 mult) is the best bet. My Jokers are Mail-In Rebate (+50), Gift Card (+10 mult), and Photograph (x2 mult on a face card). If I get a face card with a Flush: (80 + 50) * (10 * 2 + 10) or ~4200 chips, which easily surpasses the goal of 2000. So I have to find a face card, or ideally 5 Hearts.

My current Hearts: 2 (7H, 6H), Clubs: 3 (JC, 4C, 3C), Diamonds: 3 (AD, 8D, 3D). Hearts in the deck are the highest chance. I will discard those 5: 4C, 3C, AD, 8D, 3D. This keeps JC, 7H, 6H.

Should I use Justice now? Glass cards provide x2 mult. If I use it on the JC: Mult = (Base * 2 * 2) + 10. The aim is only 2000, and I will likely already be good enough. Glass cards can break! Better to save the consumable for a harder round.

# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.
